Module paths
Package ntnu.idatt2001.ejhaslerjorgfi.util

Class SceneChanger

java.lang.Object
ntnu.idatt2001.ejhaslerjorgfi.util.SceneChanger
public class SceneChanger extends Object

SceneChanger

Controller class which is responsible for the transition between different Scenes in the application. It contains methods for hiding the current scene and to display one of the other scenes in the application.

Since:
01.03.2023
Version:
16.05.2023
Author:
Group 24

    • setApplicationStage

      public static void setApplicationStage(javafx.stage.Stage appStage)
      Initializes the stage which the GUI is loaded into.

      Controller will be initialized when the application Stage is set, since they require the Stage object in order to function properly.

      Parameters:
      stage - the stage object of the application.
